name: My father’s path
description:
War has gathered us here 
War was our fathers path 
War, war has been the destiny of our fathers 
What goes through the mind of a child?
Will they pick up a gun, or a pen?
Will they go on rooftops to watch missiles or shooting stars? 
War has gathered us here so we can imagine we’re those children, playing in the ruins of the remnants of cities.
